infos.value: Are the Rundalls... Are they dead?
No, they just won't be able to move for a while. No need to worry.
Because we barely had to exert ourselves, you know.
You guys rule!
We wouldn't have made it without your help.
Thank you.
What exactly did those Rundall soldiers want with you two?
Uh...
Tyytas. That's nothing for you to pry into.
Brother, what are you saying? You charged in without knowing who was at fault, you know!
It is you who doesn't know, Tyytas.
Huh...?
This is Lykeros territory.
Rundall soldiers are here unleashing chaos on another nation's land, so there is no doubt that they were the ones at fault.
Again, you don't seem to grasp it, Brother.
Rundall and Lykeros are in the midst of war right now.
Oh?
So it's not out of the ordinary for Rundall soldiers to be here.
...Now, then. You two should be careful as well.
Let's get going.
Wait a second. Who exactly are you people?
Judging by the looks of it...not from Rundall or Lykeros?
Letâ€™s just say...I am a handsome wanderer.
Quite bold of you to say so yourself...
Well, you know I detest lying.
But surely you have roots somewhere, right?
I know you were trying to hide it. That swordsmanship... You're no ordinary traveler.
Hahahaha. How embarrassing.
I had planned on concealing it completely, but I suppose a genius's talent is bound to reveal itself in the end.
I even frighten myself.
And so this genius... Where is he from?
I'm sorry, but you'll have to forgive me for not divulging that one. Withholding a measure of mystery keeps a man more alluring.
Look at you, putting on airs even though you ran away from training...
That's right. Our father got angry and threw Howlie out.
Hahahaha. Well, I suppose everyone has a past.
In other words, our brother here was disowned after endlessly skipping out on training, and we, his worried siblings, followed him here.
Hmm. I see.
Well, are you satisfied now?
On that note, we will be on our way.
How I wish I could stick around. Please excuse my tactless brother.
Bye byyye!
What a surprise.
I know. To think that we would meet with such skilled men...
...They could be of use to us.
Now that's what I'm talking about. Never a dull moment when traveling with you.
